div.div: Prices received for commonly caught fish.
div.p: A comparison of mean price per pound in cordobas between near and far communities for the nine most commonly caught marine species based on total weight between the years 2010 and 2012. Error bars represent the standard error of the mean. Species from top to bottom are Farfantepenaeus duorarum (shrimp), Litopenaeus setiferus (white shrimp), Cynoscion spp. (weakfish), Centropomus undecimalis (snook), Micropogonias spp. (croaker), Eugerres plumieri (mojarra), Caranx hippos (jack), and Bagre marinus (catfish). The six fish species illustrations are reprinted under a CC BY license with permission from Diane Peebles, 1992, 1992, 1992, 1998, 1992, and 1992 ( S1 File). The two shrimp species illustrations are reprinted from Wikimedia Commons and are works in the public domain of the United States ( S2 and S3 Files).
